name: The Queen's Footsteps (Collector's Edition): All in One
description:
This collector's edition is a boxed mail order release of a text adventure. It contains:
  • The Queen's Footsteps
  • Two Days to the Race (bonus game featuring the same protagonist)
  • Cardboard box, shrinkwrapped
  • Manual in DIN-A5 size in English (eight pages)
  • Micro SD card with the disk images and bonus material
  • Pocket mirror in a linen bag
  • Poster (DIN-A3 size)
  • Sticker
All listed platforms are included with this release on two 3.5" disks, three 5.25" disks and one 3" disk.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, Commodore 16, Plus/4, Commodore 64, Commodore 128, Commodore PET/CBM, DOS, Macintosh, VIC-20, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
